subject: Attn:
body:
Attn:  
We have decided to contact you immediately because we caught one of our staff trying to present a lady as your representative to receive your US$10.5M dollars. But when we started asking her some sensitive questions concerning the fund, she could not give the correct answer.
So we have her arrested and she confessed about her involvement with the staff. The two of them are now in police detention. You are therefore to get back with your details to enable us start the processing of your fund release.
I wish you plenty of luck.
Best regards,
Ben Richards
Foreign Remittance Department,
United Bank for Africa

subject: Re:   Attn:
body:
Hello Ben Richards,

Thank you for reaching out and informing me about this situation. It's quite surprising to hear that someone was trying to impersonate me. I'm glad your team caught them in time.

Could you please tell me more about the fund you mentioned? How did it come into existence and why is it associated with my name? Also, could you provide some details about the processing of the fund release?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jack
